dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.resource.res.phy.hw.Hardware
dataStructure.description:
This is an abstract base class that represents any type of hardware entity that exists as an atomic unit that is not a PhysicalLink or a PhysicalConnector. Hardware is defined as any component that has a distinct physical identity and can be a component of a PhysicalDevice. An object has a physical identity if it has a physical manifestation that enables it to be held and have a label attached to it. Thus, software, files, protocols, and policies are not physical objects.

This entity is abstract

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: Hardware

child.name: commonPlatformEnumeration
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association HardwareIdentifiedByCPEName

This association end is optional
child.label: commonPlatformEnumeration
